Package Quackbot

Quackbot core.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
InitHook An interface for adding Hooks to the Quackbot start process.
PluginType The core of any PluginType abstract class.
 

Class Summary
Bot Bot instance that communicates with 1 server -Initiates all commands Used by: Controller, spawned commands
Bot.ThreadGroupLocal<T>  
Controller Quackbot is an advanced IRC bot framework based off of PircBot.
GUI Provides a GUI for bot -Output is formated and displayed -Can initate Reload There should only be 1 instance of this.
PluginExecutor All calls to ANY command run are called using this class.
 

Package Quackbot Description

Quackbot core. All main classes vital to the function of Quackbot eist here

This includes the GUI, controller, bots, plugin loaders, and plugin executors. Utils are kept here as well
